title: Tooru Saesen, Ultimate Liar

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Lie to someone, changing your wincon to theirs.
-Seduce someone, they will target you for the next two nights because of how fucking sexy you are.
-Remove your eye with your cap, traumatizing everyone that visits you, roleblocking them and blackmailing them.
-Enter a bacin, removing you from the game for the day and night after you enter It. Everyone that visits you will also enter a bacin
-Get fixed, changing your faction and goal to Town. This has a ~60% chance of not working.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You may multitask
Goal: Succesfully escape a killing game.
